article.title: Salient Appoints Mullin, Perdue to Mission Support Solutions
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: The Responsive Mission Support Solutions business unit of Salient Federal Solutions Incorporated, Fairfax, Virginia, has appointed Lt. Col. Jim Mullin, USAF (Ret.), as a program manager for aviation and logistics training programs; and Chief Master Sgt. James Perdue, USAF (Ret.), as a project coordinator for developing and managing client relationships.
